Frontend 作品
Appier Ad Generating Template Systems
An ad generating template system to generate dynamic ads with recommendation datafeed.
I was almost the FE owner of the Mimic project and also developed lots of NodeJS scripts in this project to accelerate team operational tasks.
Its features are easy-to-use/WYSIWYG UI, complicated business logic and operational tasks to keep production ads up-to-date.
React with Hooks / ES6 / GraphQL / ramda / JSON schema / Jest / Cypress / Webpack
Appier Ad Configuration and Management Systems
An FE mono repo with lots of Appier internal ad configuration and management systems.
Its features are fancy UI and complicated UX.
I was the FE owner of Datafeed Manager and also contributed to Creative Uploader, Creative 3.0/2.0 and Richmedia Panel.
React with Hooks / Typescript / ES6 / GraphQL / ramda / Material UI / Jest / Webpack
NovoDS Digital Signage Solution
Go
從無到有獨自建立的雲端數位看板系統，負責所有前端部分。用 React Hooks 完成所見即所得數位看板編輯器，類似 Wix 或 Adobe illustrator，但更包含許多的動態 Widgets, e.g., Weather, Clock, FB, IG, Youtube, RSS, Twitter...
View demo video
React / Redux / Styled-components / Websocket / OAuth / JWT / Webpack
我的個人網站
Go
這是我的個人網站，不用任何套件而用 CSS Grid 寫成的 RWD Pinterest like Layout 設計。
Source code
Typescript / React with Hooks/ NextJS / Styled-components
Hi-Tech Digital CCTV
Go
此網站為我六年前用Angular JS(Angular1)，幫阿姨建置的 RWD 官網。首頁等待阿姨提供首頁內容。全站由個人負責製作，包含所有美術、切圖、前端JS...。
Source code
Angular JS / RWD / Bootstrap / Compass / SASS / HTML5 / CSS3 / AJAX
經典名畫
Go
此網站為六年前我用 jQuery 與 CSS 練習動畫的作品，收集了我認為經典的名畫，並詳細介紹畫派與畫家的風格與特色。RWD，在行動裝置與平板上亦有良好的視覺呈現。全站由個人負責製作，包含所有美術、切圖、前端JS...。
Source code
Compass / RWD / SASS / HTML5 / CSS3 / jQuery
